DOC.detailed_description: A total 24 subject CF impair glucose tolerance diabetes relate CF ( CFRD ) unmedicated recruit . Participants recruit research nurse CF , analyze available data medical record seek participation subject meet inclusion exclusion criterion . Patients receive visit outpatient clinic FK Hotel -Dieu du CHUM hospital , inform consent form ( ICF ) study . Their intention participate main inclusion exclusion criterion confirm telephone interview conduct member team IRCM . Finally , visit IRCM , subject get answer question ICF ICF sign procedure . All participant agree participate research project must undergo short telephone interview ( 20 minute ) 4 assessment visit ( approximately 1-5 hour ) Pre ( 2 visit ) post ( 2 visit ) study . The control patient delay exercise conduct assessment visit end training . GROUP 1 EXERCISES : Patients exercise group require take part two supervise training session 8 follow phone call . The exercise program perform three time per week one hour . GROUP 2 CONTROL : Participants control group contact phone month follow entry study . On occasion reminder complete physical activity log realize . Following visit # 6 , patient control group invite participate second study phase participate supervised exercise program . This participation involve additional 12 week follow-up , include visit Group 1 exercise . In case , simplify participation reduce volume blood collect , final visit ( # 5 ) project also first visit exercise phase . This part study , involve 2 supervised training session 8 follow phone call . The exercise program perform three time per week one hour .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Men woman 18 year old . Diagnosis CF document . Obstructive ventilatory deficit light moderate , defined guideline ATS / ERS , FEV / FVC ratio > 70 % â‰¥ 40 % FEV . Stable health status , episode superinfection past 6 week . Impaired glucose tolerance , glucose > 11.1 mmol / L 1st hour OGTT unmedicated CFRD . Patients want participate exercise program 12 week . Sedentary ( less 105 min / week physical activity ) . Exclusion Criteria : Exacerbation respiratory symptom without hospitalization , use oral antibiotic last 6 week . Exacerbation intravenous antibiotic . Severe obstructive deficit define FEV < 40 % , FEV / FVC ratio < 70 % . Any disease condition may limit exercise performance . Without treatment oral hypoglycemia , insulin , oral anti inflammatory treatment may influence glucose metabolism ( patient cortef accept ) . Hemoptysis ( > 5060 cc ) last 6 week . Desaturation exercise .
